## Public Member Functions

### emitConstantPool() {#a3be62931e10ef98f2b7f7151eac8c3d4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void XtensaAsmPrinter::emitConstantPool ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print to the current output stream assembly representations of the constants in the constant pool MCP.

EmitConstantPool - Print to the current output stream assembly representations of the constants in the constant pool MCP.

This is used to print out constants which have been &quot;spilled to memory&quot; by the code generator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h/#l00039">39</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h">XtensaAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp/#l00142">142</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp">XtensaAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

getPassName - Return a nice clean name for a pass.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

### PrintAsmMemoryOperand() {#a1cd6f021b9fc6bd668a04672518d76ef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool XtensaAsmPrinter::PrintAsmMemoryOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant as an address.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate. This method can return true if the operand is erroneous.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h">XtensaAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp/#l00192">192</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp">XtensaAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.

### PrintAsmOperand() {#a11e5a3c8de5b798b724490e5ed8ede34}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool XtensaAsmPrinter::PrintAsmOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; O)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant.

PrintAsmOperand - Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate. This method can return true if the operand is erroneous.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate for machine specific ExtraCodes or when the arch-independent handling would be too complex otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-h">XtensaAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp/#l00180">180</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xtensa/xtensaasmprinter-cpp">XtensaAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
